description.narrative: The program and project development objectives are to scale up energy savings in residential and public sectors, strengthen EESL’s institutional capacity, and enhance its access to commercial financing.

title.narrative: PDO Indicator 3- Amount of commercial financing leveraged by the IBRD guarantee
PDO Indicator 2- Avoided CO2 emissions associated with projected lifetime savings from LED bulbs, LED tube lights, energy efficientceiling fans and LED street lights sold via EESL programs
IR Indicator 2.1- Number of LED street lights installed under SLNP
PDO Indicator 1- Projected lifetime energy savings from LED bulbs, tube lights, EE ceiling fans and LED Street Lights sold via EESLprograms.
IR Indicator 1.1- Number of LED bulbs and tube lights sold via EESL program
IR Indicator 1.2- Estimated number of beneficiaries (of which women) of LED bulbs sold via EESL program
IR Indicator 1.0- Direct employment (number of jobs) created of which women
IR Indicator 2.2 - Number of municipalities/towns/villages/gram panchayats with LED street lights installed through SLNP
IR Indicator 1.3 - Number of energy efficient ceiling fans sold via EESL program
IR Indicator 4.3 - Adoption by EESL managemnet of standardized procurement documents" "Guidelines", SBDs and MOU formats
IR Indicator 3.2 - EESL approval of business model for collaboration with private sectur ESCOs in the implementation of EESL's Builidng EE activities
IR Indicator 4.2- Approval of capacity buidling and training program for EE provate sector to facilitate support and participation in EE market segments
IR Indicator 1.4- Approval of EESL strategy for sustainable LED market transformation in residential lighting, including set of indicators EESL will monitor and track
IR Indicator 4.1- Periodic independent evaluations of EESL programs
PDO Indicator 4 - Establishment of Sustainable Development Unit and report on implementation of updated EHSS Manual covering all EESL programs under implementation
IR Indicator 3.1 - EESL implementation of the three EE AC sustainability actions approved
